title: Graticule Layer Configuration
description: Configuration for latitude/longitude grid lines on the globe

updateOrder.description: Layer update priority (lower numbers update first)

visual.description: Visual appearance settings for graticule lines

color.description: Color of grid lines as decimal number (0x444444 = 4473924)

opacity.description: Opacity of grid lines (0 = transparent, 1 = opaque)

radius.description: Radius multiplier from Earth surface (1.01 = slightly above surface)

renderOrder.description: Render order (higher = renders on top of other layers)

segmentsPerLine.description: Number of segments per line for smooth curves. Higher = smoother

depthTest.description: Whether lines are hidden behind the globe (true = realistic)

depthWrite.description: Whether to write to depth buffer (false for transparency)

lod.description: Level of Detail settings based on camera distance

maxDistance.description: Maximum camera distance for this LOD level (null = infinite)

latStep.description: Degrees between latitude lines (10 = every 10 degrees)

lonStep.description: Degrees between longitude lines (10 = every 10 degrees)
